definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: One corollary of this general principle is that services should not be stateful.
sentences.chinese: 此總體原則的一個推論就是，服務不應爲有狀態型的。

sentences.english: Can simulation help you determine what inferences to draw under these circumstances?
sentences.chinese: 模擬有助於您決定在這些環境下獲得什麼推論嗎？

sentences.english: Which of the following statements can be inferred from the passage?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪一項敘述可以從本文中推論出來？

sentences.english: Ignoring the intra-cluster correlation may lead to erroneous inferences about the intervention effects.
sentences.chinese: 若忽略羣集中可能的相關，會使推論錯誤的機會增加。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, it also deduces and links with some other paronyms.
sentences.chinese: 同時，考證中還推論系聯了其他同源詞。

sentences.english: This is an combined inference derived from Axiom of Physics and observation of CMBR.
sentences.chinese: 這是基於宇宙微波背景輻射和物理學公理的聯合推論。

sentences.english: The Stoics developed three eidetic reductions of future misfortune.
sentences.chinese: 禁慾學派對於預測災難發展三個心象的推論。

sentences.english: This second statement is an inference, since it cannot be verified.
sentences.chinese: 這種陳述就是一個推論，因爲它難以驗證。

sentences.english: Your clear reasoning is quite correct.
sentences.chinese: 你的條理清楚的推論非常正確。

sentences.english: The cause of end stage renal disease is multifactorial.
sentences.chinese: 出生日時體重過低被推論是末期腎病致病原因之一。

sentences.english: Chapter IV, the cognitive associating function of Inferential discourse markers "Ni-kan".
sentences.chinese: 第四章推論性話語標記“你看”的認知關聯功能。

sentences.english: On the basis of the evidence we deduce that he is guilty.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些證據，我們推論他是有罪的。

sentences.english: Gone, too, is any attempt to prove God by reason alone.
sentences.chinese: 也不會有人會單單依靠推論就來證明上帝。

sentences.english: This article mainly gives us the proof of the simple defective number theorem, and also introduces us some inferences of it.
sentences.chinese: 給出了簡虧量定理的證明，並介紹了它的幾個推論。

sentences.english: This theory fits with other facts, too.
sentences.chinese: 這一推論也與其他事實相吻合。

sentences.english: There is one worrying possibility this study suggests.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究有一個令人擔憂的推論。

definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
